original_title: 新人NO.1STYLE 乙白さやかAVデビュー
overview: Sayaka Otoshiro, 19 years old, has never been in a relationship with a boy, but is trying to enter the adult world. She has loved idols and sexy actresses for a long time and has longed for such a world where she can stand in front of people. Her face and personality are innocent and cute... but her height is 169cm, her legs are long and she has mature proportions. A real documentary AV virgin work that shows her sex for the first time while her girlfriend with her gap shakes between her curiosity and anxiety. Full of vigor and purity.
title: Fresh Face NO. 1 STYLE: Sayaka Otoshiro AV Debut
